meanings.definition: Full of residents or inhabitants; having a large population.
meanings.sent1: The bustling city was populous with many people going about their daily lives.
meanings.sent2: The populous town grew rapidly as more families moved in.
meanings.sent3: The zoo became quite populous with visitors eager to see the new baby animals.
meanings.sent4: The forest was so populous with trees that it felt like walking through a green sea.
meanings.sent5: The classroom was so populous that finding an empty seat became a challenge.

meanings.definition: A group of people living in a particular area.
meanings.sent1: The populous of the small village gathered for the annual harvest festival.
meanings.sent2: The bustling city was a populous of diverse cultures and traditions.
meanings.sent3: The book club became a populous of avid readers sharing their favorite novels.
meanings.sent4: The soccer stadium turned into a populous of cheering fans during the championship game.
meanings.sent5: The online forum became a populous of users discussing various topics.
